name: Deep Space (itch) (Deep-Fold)
description:
Submission for the Revival Jam.

Shoot you way through 3 levels of enemies using a custom layout of weapons. Fight the boss when you think you are ready and go on to the next level.

Making:

I wanted to make a space shooter but with more freedom of movement than you usually see. Also wanted a little bit of arcade feel, but have it look a little more modern.

This was made for the revival jam, the point was to use an existing idea/project and finish it. this is what my original project looked like:

There wasn't really anything to do and the control were very different. So basically everything that is currently in the game was added during the jam. However I had the idea to create a game like this for quite a while, and already had ideas about how everything was going to look like.

Because this was made using Godot the game is going to lag a little bit when an effect is used for the first time in the game, however once they are all loaded in it should run smooth (I hope).

Also fun fact: the only sprites used in this game are for the rockets and some basic shapes for particles. Everything else is generated using shaders.

Controls:

  • Mouse: Aim & shoot
  • WASD: Steer/switch weapons in weapon view
  • Q: Open/close weapon view
  • E: Open/close map
